cause.description:
Everytime a chicken crosses a road they risk being mocked and having insolent humans cracking jokes about them. (eg. Why did the chicken cross the road? To get to the other side.) This blatant disregard for the rights of poultry must STOP.
1. Chickens must have improved rights.
2. The stupid chicken jokes MUST end.
3. There may only be one reason why the chicken crossed the road and that is their own bussiness.
cause.mission: Give the right of unquestioned crossing of roads to all chickens and other fowl.
cause.name: Allowing Chickens to Cross Roads Without People Questioning Why.
